data.name: gromacs
data.description: Public/backup repository of the GROMACS molecular simulation toolkit. Please do not mine the metadata blindly; we use https://gitlab.com/gromacs/gromacs for code review and issue tracking.

license.name: GNU Lesser General Public License v2.1

evidence: "Welcome to the official version of GROMACS!" and references to "The GROMACS Crew" suggest a community-governed project rather than a single lab or company.

"If you are familiar with Unix, it should be fairly trivial to compile and install GROMACS. GROMACS uses only the CMake build system" indicates users compile and install from source, pointing to source-repo distribution.

"GROMACS 4.5: a high-throughput and highly parallel open source molecular simulation toolkit" and "Good luck with your simulations!" show it is an end-user molecular simulation application directly used to generate research results.
